Termagotchi
===============================

version number: 0.0.1
author: Cadel Watson

Overview
--------

A Tamagotchi-inspired virtual pet

Installation / Usage
--------------------

To install use pip:

    $ pip install termagotchi


Or clone the repo:

    $ git clone https://github.com/kdelwat/termagotchi.git
    $ python setup.py install
